TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScriptReference extends System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase

summary.span: 註冊 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 檔案以用於 ASP.NET 網頁。

span.span: Registers an ECMAScript (JavaScript) file for use on an ASP.NET Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以透過向註冊包含 ASP.NET Web 網頁上的 JavaScript 檔案物件。You can include a JavaScript file on an ASP.NET Web page by registering it through a object. 您可以註冊的指令碼檔案是位於網站上的.js 檔案 （靜態指令碼檔案）。You can register a script file that is located as a .js file (a static script file) on the Web site. 您也可以註冊指令碼檔案內嵌為組件中的資源。You can also register a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly. 註冊的指令碼檔案之後, 您可以使用其用戶端指令碼中的函式在網頁上。After registering the script file, you can use its functions in client script on the Web page. 若要註冊靜態指令碼檔案，設定屬性檔案的相對位置的物件。To register a static script file, set the property of the object to the relative location of the file. 若要註冊指令碼檔案內嵌為組件中的資源，設定屬性包含檔案的組件的名稱。To register a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly, set the property to the name of the assembly that contains the file. 然後設定屬性設為內嵌在組件中的.js 檔案的名稱。Then set the property to the name of the .js file that is embedded in the assembly. 在此情況下，指令碼檔案必須內嵌，未連結。In that case, the script file must be embedded, not linked. 您設定屬性，指出是否要使用偵錯或發行指令碼的版本。You set the property to indicate whether to use the debug or release version of the script. 值產生不同的結果，根據它參考到獨立的指令碼檔案或組件中內嵌為資源的指令碼檔案。The value produces different results depending on whether it refers to a standalone script file or to a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly. 獨立的指令碼檔案以定義屬性。A standalone script file is defined with the property. 組件參考必須透過和屬性。An assembly reference must be accessed through the and properties. 結果值如下：The results for the value are as follows: - 套用到獨立的指令碼檔案時，指定屬性，值相當於。When it is applied to a standalone script file where the property is specified, the value is equivalent to . - 當它套用到組件中的指令碼參考相當於。When it is applied to a script reference in an assembly, is equivalent to . 只有當指定，它用來參考指令碼。When only is specified, it is used to reference the script. 當和屬性同時指定而不是使用屬性，但值等於仍。When and the property are both specified, the property is used instead of , but the value is still equivalent to . ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何參考自訂控制項和內嵌控制項組件中的 JavaScript 檔案。The following example shows how to reference a custom control and a JavaScript file that is embedded in the control assembly. 組件會假設在網站的 Bin 資料夾中。The assembly is assumed to be in the Bin folder of the Web site. 自訂控制項繪製控制項。The custom control animates controls. JavaScript 檔就會編譯為 SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js 名為內嵌資源。The JavaScript file is compiled as an embedded resource that is named SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js. 使用註冊內嵌的 JavaScript 檔案和屬性。You register the embedded JavaScript file by using the and properties. 若要使用此範例中，來編譯 JavaScript 檔案中所顯示的範例做為內嵌的資源，以自訂控制項。To use this example, compile the JavaScript file that is shown in the example as an embedded resource with the custom control. 將產生的組件放入網站的 Bin 資料夾。Put the resulting assembly into the Bin folder of the Web site. 如需如何將 JavaScript 檔案內嵌在組件的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 將 JavaScript 檔案當做資源內嵌在組件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89)。For an example of how to embed a JavaScript file in an assembly, see [Walkthrough: Embedding a JavaScript File as a Resource in an Assembly](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89). 下列範例使用自訂控制項的網頁。The following example shows a page that uses the custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/Default.aspx#1)] 下列範例顯示自訂控制項的類別定義。The following example shows the custom control class definition. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/customcontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/customcontrol.vb#2)] 下列範例顯示支援的 JavaScript 檔案。The following example shows the supporting JavaScript file. [!code-javascript[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/UpdatePanelAnimation.js#3)] 下列範例會顯示您必須加入包含自訂控制項的專案的 AssemblyInfo 檔案和 JavaScript 檔案的程式碼。The following example shows code that you must add to the AssemblyInfo file of the project that contains the custom control and the JavaScript file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/AssemblyInfo.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/AssemblyInfo.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Assembly { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Assembly : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定組件的名稱，這個組件包含用戶端指令碼檔做為內嵌資源。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the assembly that contains the client script file as an embedded resource.

value.span: 組件的完整或不完整名稱，其中包含做為內嵌資源的用戶端指令碼檔。

span.span: The fully qualified or partially qualified name of the assembly that contains a client script file as an embedded resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您設定屬性，當您參考就會包含做為內嵌資源的組件中的用戶端指令碼檔案。You set the property when you reference a client script file that is included as an embedded resource in an assembly. 設定完整或不完整的組件名稱。Set to the fully qualified or partially qualified assembly name. 完整組件名稱包括名稱、 文化特性、 公開金鑰和版本號碼。A fully qualified assembly name includes a name, culture, public key, and version number. 完整的組件名稱只包含名稱。A partially qualified assembly name includes only a name. 當您指定的值，您也必須指定名稱中的內嵌資源屬性。When you specify a value for , you must also specify the name of the embedded resource in the property. 否則，就會擲回。Otherwise, an will be thrown. 被參考組件必須位於網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取中。The assembly being referenced must be located in either the Bin folder of the Web site or in the global assembly cache. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何參考自訂控制項和內嵌控制項組件中的 JavaScript 檔案。The following example shows how to reference a custom control and a JavaScript file that is embedded in the control assembly. 組件會假設在網站的 Bin 資料夾中。The assembly is assumed to be in the Bin folder of the Web site. 自訂控制項繪製控制項。The custom control animates controls. JavaScript 檔就會編譯為 SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js 名為內嵌資源。The JavaScript file is compiled as an embedded resource that is named SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js. 使用註冊內嵌的 JavaScript 檔案和屬性。You register the embedded JavaScript file by using the and properties. 若要使用此範例中，來編譯 JavaScript 檔案中所顯示的範例做為內嵌的資源，以自訂控制項。To use this example, compile the JavaScript file that is shown in the example as an embedded resource with the custom control. 將產生的組件放入網站的 Bin 資料夾。Put the resulting assembly into the Bin folder of the Web site. 如需如何將 JavaScript 檔案內嵌在組件的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 將 JavaScript 檔案當做資源內嵌在組件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89)。For an example of how to embed a JavaScript file in an assembly, see [Walkthrough: Embedding a JavaScript File as a Resource in an Assembly](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89). 下列範例使用自訂控制項的網頁。The following example shows a page that uses the custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/Default.aspx#1)] 下列範例顯示自訂控制項的類別定義。The following example shows the custom control class definition. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/customcontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/customcontrol.vb#2)] 下列範例顯示支援的 JavaScript 檔案。The following example shows the supporting JavaScript file. [!code-javascript[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/UpdatePanelAnimation.js#3)] 下列範例會顯示您必須加入包含自訂控制項的專案的 AssemblyInfo 檔案和 JavaScript 檔案的程式碼。The following example shows code that you must add to the AssemblyInfo file of the project that contains the custom control and the JavaScript file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/AssemblyInfo.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/AssemblyInfo.vb#4)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This property is obsolete. Instead of using ScriptManager.ScriptPath, set the Path property on each individual ScriptReference.")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指出當您註冊資源中的用戶端指令碼檔時， 屬性是否包含在 URL 中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the property is included in the URL when you register a client script file from a resource.

value.span: 如果您在註冊用戶端指令碼時未使用指令碼路徑，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the script path is not used when you register the client script; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您設定至`true`當您想要註冊用戶端指令碼檔案，而不會包括指令碼檔案的 URL 中的值。You set to `true` when you want to register a client script file without including the value in the URL of the script file.

summary.span: 取得或設定內嵌資源的名稱，這個資源包含用戶端指令碼檔。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the embedded resource that contains the client script file.

value.span: 用戶端指令碼檔的名稱，這個會檔案內嵌在組件中做為資源。

span.span: The name of the client script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您設定屬性來參考組件中內嵌為資源的用戶端指令碼檔案。You set the property to reference a client script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly. 如果您可以定義兩個值和在相同的指令碼參考中，屬性屬性會優先。If you define values for both the and properties in the same script reference, the property takes precedence. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何參考自訂控制項和內嵌控制項組件中的 JavaScript 檔案。The following example shows how to reference a custom control and a JavaScript file that is embedded in the control assembly. 組件會假設在網站的 Bin 資料夾中。The assembly is assumed to be in the Bin folder of the Web site. 自訂控制項繪製控制項。The custom control animates controls. JavaScript 檔就會編譯為 SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js 名為內嵌資源。The JavaScript file is compiled as an embedded resource that is named SampleControl.UpdatePanelAnimation.js. 使用註冊內嵌的 JavaScript 檔案和屬性。You register the embedded JavaScript file by using the and properties. 若要使用此範例中，來編譯 JavaScript 檔案中所顯示的範例做為內嵌的資源，以自訂控制項。To use this example, compile the JavaScript file that is shown in the example as an embedded resource with the custom control. 將產生的組件放入網站的 Bin 資料夾。Put the resulting assembly into the Bin folder of the Web site. 如需如何將 JavaScript 檔案內嵌在組件的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 將 JavaScript 檔案當做資源內嵌在組件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89)。For an example of how to embed a JavaScript file in an assembly, see [Walkthrough: Embedding a JavaScript File as a Resource in an Assembly](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8cb78cd-95a9-4dc6-92df-391866817e89). 下列範例使用自訂控制項的網頁。The following example shows a page that uses the custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/Default.aspx#1)] 下列範例顯示自訂控制項的類別定義。The following example shows the custom control class definition. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/customcontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/customcontrol.vb#2)] 下列範例顯示支援的 JavaScript 檔案。The following example shows the supporting JavaScript file. [!code-javascript[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/UpdatePanelAnimation.js#3)] 下列範例會顯示您必須加入包含自訂控制項的專案的 AssemblyInfo 檔案和 JavaScript 檔案的程式碼。The following example shows code that you must add to the AssemblyInfo file of the project that contains the custom control and the JavaScript file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/CS/AssemblyInfo.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReference#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReference/vb/AssemblyInfo.vb#4)]

summary.span: 傳回字串，表示 屬性、 屬性或型別名稱的值。

span.span: Returns a string that represents the value of the property, the property, or the type name.

returns.span: 如果已定義 屬性，便會傳回其值，或者，如果已定義 屬性，便會傳回其值，否則，會傳回 屬性的值。

span.span: The value of the property if it is defined, or the value of the property if it is defined; otherwise, the value of the property.
